data.name: Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator Demo
data.detailed_description:
Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator is a physics-based tactics RPG game which you leading your own force in fantasy medieval world.
Build your army and siege equipments. Experience epic siege battles. Lead your people revolting the tyrant!

Features:
·Recruit, train, and command a mercenary force in a procedurally generated medieval world.
·Each of commander has their own skills,troops and traits which can impact combat and story encounters.
·Diverse troops roster. Each kinds of troops have their unique equipment, skills. And each troop has own AI behavior.

data.short_description: Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator is a physics-based tactics RPG game which you leading your own force in fantasy medieval world. Build your army and siege equipments. Experience epic siege battles. Lead your people revolting the tyrant!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
